table_description: AWS IAM User Service Specific Credential

columns.name: service_name
columns.description: The name of the service associated with the service-specific credential.

columns.name: service_specific_credential_id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the service-specific credential.

columns.name: create_date
columns.description: The date and time, in ISO 8601 date-time format (http://www.iso.org/iso/iso8601), when the service-specific credential were created.

columns.name: service_user_name
columns.description: The generated user name for the service-specific credential.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the service-specific credential. Active means that the key is valid for API calls, while Inactive means it is not.

columns.name: user_name
columns.description: The name of the IAM user associated with the service-specific credential.
